column5: I am waiting very impatiently for the photos and report from your trip.  If you do not post them soon....... I........... I.............. I won't even read it when you do.        Ok that was a bluff. Do you have a teaser at least?  It's going to kill me isn't it?
I need a bit of time, been working non stop since we returned Wed morning. It was amazing though, lots of giant pike.
About 20 minutes ago I sent Mike a PM telling him I'm getting impatient.
Well then leave him alone darn it.

Seriously though I'm already marking off the days on the callendar for a return next spring. I've fished all over N/W ON and guided at Kesagami and this river tops anything I've fished for pike.  Still waiting on some video clips and photos from one of the boys, I should have something posted next week.
what the hell NEXT WEEK Cant you see my veins are collapsing!!!!
Give Solo a bit of time, he is gathering the "porn of graphy", it will come soon! the 'man' has to work at it!
Well, he is gonna have to stop at my place on his way home from work to-night and give me a verbal report. I'm awaitin' too! Comon Mike, I got cold ones in the fridge....
I'd love to bud...but I get off work at 6am tomorrow. (I like the way you think though.  )
Well, then leave for work early!
I didn't even get the low down from Mike, all I got was a voicemail that said "I dunno if you are in Halifax but you gotta call me"  lol!!!!!!!  bugger.
First I find out about the potential trip openings AFTER they have left, and now there's not even a report...next week...psh
